entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Fort Resolution
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Resolution Airport 7:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
Temperature: -15.8°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -18.1°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023
